title: Did the Celtics Just Blow the Title? | With Kevin Hench
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Kevin Hench to discuss the Warriors’ Game 5 win over the Celtics, the improvement of Andrew Wiggins and Klay Thompson throughout the series, struggles from the Celtics bench, HC Steve Kerr vs. HC Ime Udoka, Gary Payton II’s impact on the series, Game 6 predictions, and more.

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Kevin Hench
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
